briefTitle: Research for Predictive Biologic Parameters of Cutaneous Hypersensitivity After Brachytherapy in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Research for Predictive Biologic Parameters of Cutaneous Hypersensitivity After Brachytherapy in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Assessment of the rate of Radiation-Induced CD8 T-Lymphocyte Apoptosis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patient treated by exclusive per-operative brachytherapy in the prior study Mammosite for breast cancer
* Patient with social security

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not applicable
